content.content:
# Stretch MEMS Designer's Handbook

This book has been written as a comprehensive, self-explanatory reference handbook for the benefit of all who have an interest in the design and application of elastic biosensing, biofeedback, and neuromodulation films.

<iframe src="pdf-viewer.html?file=assets/docs/Stretch%20MEMS%20Designer%27s%20Handbook.pdf" width="100%" height="600" title="Stretch MEMS Designer's Handbook"></iframe>
